title: 25. "I Don't Need You, But I Want You" 10 Signs You May Be Codependent
itunes:title: 25. "I Don't Need You, But I Want You" 10 Signs You May Be Codependent
description:
Hey Girl Hey!

 

This week we get deep into the world of codependency. We talk about what codependency is, what are some of the signs of codependency, how codependency and narcissism are two sides of the same coin, how codependency affects self-esteem, codependency and the ego, and the steps to take to get a handle on your codependency.

 

Please don't forget to leave a rating and review! :)

Click here to grab your free guide on the 5 Daily Tips on How to Stop Caring What Other People Think

 

Name of the book of the month for October: Complex PTSD: From Surviving to Thriving by Pete Walker

 

Business Inquiries?
Email the team: hi@beatricekamau.com
IG: @theselflovefix.
Website: www.beatricekamau.com
